cinematiczoom.configuration.title: CinematicZoom Configuration
Height of cinematic black bars as percentage of screen height (0-50%)
cinematiczoom.configuration.smoothMs.too: Animation transition time in milliseconds. 0 = instant zoom
cinematiczoom.configuration.mouseWheelEn: Allow adjusting zoom level with mouse wheel while holding zoom key
cinematiczoom.configuration.hideHudDurin: Temporarily hide HUD and crosshair while zooming (like F1 mode)
cinematiczoom.configuration.enableCinema: Enable smooth camera movement during zoom
cinematiczoom.configuration.baseZoomMult: Initial zoom level when activating zoom (lower = more zoom)
cinematiczoom.configuration.minZoomMulti: Minimum zoom level when using mouse wheel
cinematiczoom.configuration.maxZoomMulti: Maximum zoom level when using mouse wheel
cinematiczoom.configuration.wheelStep.to: Zoom adjustment per mouse wheel tick
